flawed_nl_solution:
Tony and Dean together read 23 + 12 = <<23+12=35>>35 books
3 of these books were duplicates so Tony and Dean together read 35 - 3 = <<35-3=32>>32 unique books
All three read 32 + 17 = <<32+17=94>>94 books
Because the books are being counted three times, the book is counted 3 - 1 = <<3-1=2>>2 extra times.
All together they have read 94 - 2 = <<94-2=92>>92 different books
#### 92

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 49, not 94. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
